Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Convenient location clean rooms sufficient breakfast buffet with good coffee Bus stop 150 meters from hotel line 74A Enough number of parking places so as hotel declares no need to book it in advance I would probably stay there again during my next visit to Vienna

Negative_Review: Breakfast option was expensive but bakeries nearby
Positive_Review: Easy access by public transportation from train station to hotel location and to tourist areas Grocery stores nearby

Negative_Review: Noise from the street can be heard in the rooms on the lower floors
Positive_Review: Clean and spacious room Comfortable and big bed Facilities Small SPA on the 6th floor Sauna and Steam Bath Near to groceries a bus and a tram station

Negative_Review: There is no lock for the bathroom door a little bit lack of privacy
Positive_Review: It was a nice stay in this hotel Although the hotel is not located near the Vienna s Ringstrasse it has a very easy access to the public transport nearby Metro U3 can take you to from city centre tram 18 can take you to from the Wien Hauptbahnhof and bus 77A can take you to from Stadion for coaches directly And there are lots of large supermarket near the hotel which is convenient for us though they usually close at 8pm

Negative_Review: There were no slippers nor hair shampoo conditioner ear buds etc There were only soap and shower gel shampoo attached to the bathroom wall I have not experienced something like this at a four stars hotel
Positive_Review: It was clean and quiet

Negative_Review: The Wellness area could be larger with space for changing clothes etc There s also currently no gymn
Positive_Review: Having the Sauna on the top floor is awesome

Negative_Review: In order to connect to Wi Fi you have to go to your room then back down again wait and after tireless efforts they connect it manually because you receive a SMS code if your phone is not able to receive this SMS forget about connecting it easily This would happen every time you leave the hotel Totally useless
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Even though the room and the bathroom were perfectly clean the windows and window sill were dusty and there was even a spider web in the top corner of the window frame
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated in a nice location not far from one of Vienna s business districts Wien Mitte The room is quite spacious with combined bathroom toilet all the necesseties presented The bed is comfortable though consisting of 2 separate matresses placed on a double bed foundation Pillows and blankes are comfortable and soft Another positive thing the air conditioning continues working even without the key card meaning that one does not return to a hot room

Negative_Review: Overall the stay was fine for after all we only needed the place for one night The ladies at the desk were pleasant and helpful when we checked in In the morning I asked a person at the front desk to please get us a taxi to the airport which he proceeded to do and it arrived in less than 10 minutes Great The airport is 15KM from the hotel and linked directly to it via the A4 highway and it took less than 15 minutes to get there Fine But he charged us 48 Euros WOW We took other taxis in Vienna and Budapest and Prague but not at these prices Now I can not blame Best Western for this but I would advise all BW Amedia guests DO NOT have the front desk call you taxi Better just go out and hail a cab any cab it will be way cheaper
Positive_Review: we were only there for one night therefore it is difficult to comment here

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very nice and comfortable hotel Located close to the inner city walking distance Many supermarkets were located in the proximity of the hotel The breakfast was also very good and it had a rich variety of food

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Best Western Plus Amedia is a nice hotel close to the company I had business with during this trip in Vienna I felt cosy the room was very clean the comfort of it is at high standards Good breakfast kind personnel Definitely a solid option for future travel in Vienna

Negative_Review: Tv has limited channels and the only thing in english is news The staff is almost bored to even talk to us Absolutely no help with even getting the luggage to the room Hospitality at bets western amedia vienna is an overstatement
Positive_Review: There are supermarkets real close by in fact one is next door

Negative_Review: The staff is not nice Their treat is unpleasant specially from the staff in the reception The atmosphere is not nice and you don t feel welcome The best are the clean personal
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: First of all the hotel is really good But the room is magnificent The bed was awesome and the pillows where great The bathroom was 10 clean as well as the room and the Internet connection was satisfying Although we made our reservation 30 before our appearance to the reception there was not problem at all The neighborhood is very nice to stay with lots of stores in just a few steps distance The distance of the metro station depends on the weather If it s cold and snowy you gonna think it s too far but in normal circumstances the distance is just fine

Negative_Review: Pillows need to be replaced Maids didn t leave coffee tea and sugar on a daily basis in the room just the first day and only for one person even though we had a triple room
Positive_Review: The room was a decent size clean breakfast was good Underground station is 10 12 minutes walk away while Stephan Platz is 40 minutes walk

Negative_Review: A little bit far away from metro station but acceptable I personally don t like two single beds put together as a King bed The price is much expensive
Positive_Review: Hotel color was nice warm

Negative_Review: main road at the front of the hotel could be noisy early morning did nt realise we could have used the window shutters to block out the sound
Positive_Review: scrambled eggs on rye bread fresh fruit salad and good coffee made a perfect breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good location close to the bus stops The triple room was of a good size Lidl store right next to the Hotel lots of other little shops restaurants around for a quick bite

Negative_Review: Prior to my initial experience I wasn t that impressed with the staff They offered minimal help on how to travel around the area didn t seem to know bus or train schedule and didn t recommend walking routes Location is also quite a ways from downtown
Positive_Review: The morning I left I forgot to set my alarm but the staff had scheduled a taxi to pick me up then called and knocked on my door to make sure I was awake and had my bill prepped to close out my room I would have missed my flight without there help

Negative_Review: Some of the staff were quite unhelpful The check in time of 3 pm was far too late even though we had asked if we could check in a couple of hours earlier as we had been driving through the night
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: It would have been nice to have breakfast included in the price but Lidl is next door so it s not the end of the world The hotel was also uncomfortably hot when I couldn t figure out how to make the heating settings cooler we just turned the whole thing off and opened the window for 4 nights much better
Positive_Review: From leaving the airport to reaching the hotel it took us 30 minutes using the train and a short walk It was great to have the added bonus of the sauna to warm up after cold days exploring Walking into town was perhaps a 20 minute stroll longer when you get distracted by the yummy bakeries Our room was clean and nicely decorated

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was so comfy I stayed with my boyfriend we had a double bed Also transportation is excellent the hotel is very very close to Old City Once you exit the hotel just turn right about 50m away there is a bus stop get off on Stubentor it is the last stop It only takes 10min Also you can take the same bus back to the hotel The bus name is 74A St Marx The hotel was very clean and the room that we accomidated in was nice and roomy

Negative_Review: I smoke so I was totally fine with the smell but I could see if someone very sensitive would be troubled There is a strong smell of smoke in the entrance great value
Positive_Review: If you don t care to stay right downtown of Vienna this hotel is a great choice Located just a short walk from S Train OBB train system from airport to St Marx and some bus stops rides from downtown Downstairs a caffe opened till 00 00 and a grocery store Lidle Across is bakery with great breakfast snacks Also EuroSpar and Billa

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel is located in a very accessible area The staff is very friendly and helpful The rooms are clean quite and nice Around the hotel there are some markets pastry shop restaurants To the Belvedere Palace you can go by walk The closest Metro station is at 700 meters but there is a Tram station at around 200 meters distance so you can take the tram to the metro because you can use the same ticket for both of them

Negative_Review: WI fi connection was not secure and did not seem to require the password Also we would have spent more time in the bar in hotel if it had had a non smoking section
Positive_Review: Rooms were clean and comfortable with good facilities

Negative_Review: Room was not clean as per the normal Standards Questionable if I will choose it next time
Positive_Review: Location only this time I had a single room with 3 beds that was not smelling very clean comparing with my previous rooms that I ve stayed in the same hotel

Negative_Review: I forgot a few cosmetics and thought there may be some shampoo conditioner and shower gel instead of just hand wash in the shower I ve stayed in 2 3 star hotels that provide this so feel it is expected from a 4 star Apart from this it was lovely
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the fridge was handy The staff were very polite helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: may is garage too expensive no any other complain
Positive_Review: excellent hotel great position for find restaurant nearby comfortable and very clean fully for recommend

Negative_Review: Everithing was perfect except cleaning
Positive_Review: The hotel located not far from the city center Probably you need to spend approximately 15 20 minutes to get to Stephansplatz Room is comfortable with nice bed and shower Staff is friendly and hospitable

Negative_Review: The place is little bit far from main facilities although there are several public transport units to easily reach there
Positive_Review: Very nicely made rooms with all the necessity and sauna was awesome

Negative_Review: We had to stay in a studio not in the hotel It wasn t too far from the hotel but inconvenient to go to the hotel every morning just to have breakfast So we didn t have any breakfast there even though it included in our room s price
Positive_Review: The staff was really good clean room with big bathroom

Negative_Review: A little off center but a bus 74A line that passes in front of the hotel all the time brings you down town in 5 10 mins so not really a problem
Positive_Review: Nice 4 hotel at a fantastic price Stylish clean well proportioned and well equipped rooms with comfortable beds All the personnel was extremely polite and helpful Marina deserving our special thanks

Negative_Review: The area where the elevators are was very cold Maybe amp up the heating in that area Close to the city we walked pretty much everywhere
Positive_Review: The staff was exceptionally helpful From restaurant recommendations to separating our bed

Negative_Review: Julius Meiln coffe made on home like coffe machine disaster for 3 5 euro
Positive_Review: The room was spotlessly clean super fast internet and kind and helpful staf For our visit hotel had a perfect location

Negative_Review: No English channels apart from the news channels Bath soap smelt like detergent Triple Room was stuffy Sliding door does not provide sufficient privacy due to gap and inability to lock
Positive_Review: Bed was comfortable

Negative_Review: Absolut all is perfect I stay here time to time
Positive_Review: Note 10 plus Perfect cleaning Pure crystal Peace comfort warm in the room Wifi works very well Rich breakfast Public transportation in front of the hotel 74a bus from the hotel will take you to the center of Vienna 4 large grocery stores near the hotel The friendly reception staff Spa area is very useful All modern clean and functional If you find it on sale do not hesitate I recommend

Negative_Review: Some of the reception staff were more helpful than others one of the female receptionists was most unhelpful and did not look like she wanted to help us either We had an issue with a tour we had booked to Salzburg when asking for help all she did was pass us a booklet to ring the tour company ourself We did however get 2 more helpful receptionists in the morning that were more helpful and actually rang the tour company for us to help us sort out our issue Overall if the staff were nicer I would have rated this hotel much higher Also one other little thing is that they did not provide slippers to use in the room this would have been a nice touch and would have been a good icing on the cake
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was great there was everything you needed right on the door step with 3 supermarkets bakery boots Superdrug type shop and pharmacy within minutes of the hotel Although hotel was not right in the centre public transport was amazing easy to use and extremely cheap we had no issues getting around at all Tip getting the bus if you can get your bearings is actually quicker than the train After arriving at the airport if going to this hotel do not get the fast city train as that s a waste of money ask at information for details of getting the local S7 train to St Marx for this hotel then once off hotel jump on the bus right outside and get off at the 2nd stop and hotel is literally right outside for th first time there it s easier to get the bus but its actually only 5 10mins walk from the station The rooms were nice and spacious and comfortable nice bathroom comfy bed If you have time definitely visit Salzburg it was an amazing place

Negative_Review: Television set switching itself on during the night quite weird
Positive_Review: Good location to reach from motorway expecially from North and East or if you come from Airport You get several restaurants and caf s along the main road so you can get a late dinner Bus metro very near to get to town centre Friendly staff own covered garage plenty of space

Negative_Review: Nothing bothered me
Positive_Review: Comfortable Close to the centre metro train and bus a few steps away Easy to find lots of groceries shops bakeries around There is also a small spa in the hotel

Negative_Review: The staff As soon as I walked in the woman at the desk wasn t friendly When I left and needed help finding the bus station I wish the person who helped me would have told me I could walk 10 minutes to the train and then take it two stops I ended up missing an earlier bus to my next destination because I didn t think I would make it in time I found out on my own that it was two stops on the train or rather U Bahn Customer service is everything and it would be nice if the staff was friendlier and more helpful
Positive_Review: The hotel is nice and my room was big with a big bathroom which is a nice change since a lot of rooms in Europe are small The hotel is clean and in an okay location Not too much around but there s a grocery store next door and one a few blocks away There s a good little bakery also a block up and the bus to take you into the city center is also close I will say again I really liked my room The bed was so comfortable and I was pleasantly surprised

Negative_Review: Very expensive breakfast We asked if we can do late checkout a few days before the actual check out The girl at the desk said no problem so I came ine day before the leaving to book the late check out and all of a sudden I cannot do it since the hotel is full When I said the othe girl said it was ok I got a shrug and that s how it is
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Booked a double room and got two singles Also there was some drilling and banging from the room above at 9 30 in the morning
Positive_Review: Great location very close to the bus stop which goes straight into central Vienna Rooms are a comfortable size and there is a handy supermarket just downstairs Would book again

Negative_Review: Away from tram metro train stations only one bus line Away from tourist places When we asked for early check in by mail hotel didn t respond positively or negatively so we reached early and room wasn t ready but they told for extra 25 Euro they can give us room n
Positive_Review: Nice clean big room good price for such room Market beside

Negative_Review: Towels had an unpleasant smell parking in hotel garage could be cheaper 17 EUR per night
Positive_Review: Good connections with city center many food shops around

Negative_Review: Parking is a bit uncomfortable for the budget 17 day but this is the case in many hotels in Europe
Positive_Review: Location is considered to be practical If you have to use the public transport the underground station U3 Kardinal Nagl Platz is about 10 min walk The rooms are so comfortable and clean like new

Negative_Review: Our window was broken we couldn t open or close it well We asked few time to fix it but even if someone came after 3 days because of the week end it was still broken But after all the hotel is very good
Positive_Review: The room was big and very clean I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel It s very well connected with the city center by bus 74A and it s less than 20 min by train S7 from the airport I would raccommend this hotel and I would come back again

Negative_Review: First of all some hair was found in our towel Above all when we arrive late in the evening surprisingly we discovered that our PREPAID room was given to other people Only after discussion with the receptionist she decided to give us another room At the checkout morging they asked me about my TWO rooms The same things happened to another woman whose reservation was lost Staff was kind but it d need more professionalism
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Very little to moan about the shower screen made it very difficult putting plug in bath and turning water on the bath for a short person which I am This was just a small annoyance The charge for breakfast was rather high but if you have a large appetite in the morning I am sure it is justified
Positive_Review: Room was fine spotlessly clean and comfortable Tea and coffee with kettle and bottled water Copious hot water in a pristine bath Reception extremely helpful and happy to answer all our questions Taxis ordered by hotel always took about three minutes to arrive Breakfast was excellent Lots of variety well presented and mouthwatering

Negative_Review: Parking is possible but too expensive we parked at P R Erdberg instead The heating was waaay too hot at nights despite i m always cold
Positive_Review: We enjoyed the location 10 mins from city centre bus or u bahn close to supermarket rooms are fine we used the sauna one time this is a plus even if its really really small

Negative_Review: The garage parking is a little bit expensive 17 EUR day but in comparison to other garages nearby the price is reasonable
Positive_Review: Beds are comfortable there is a kettle in a room with some tea coffee many grocery shops nearby even LIDL in the same building safe garage parking Also it is not far from big shopping center and railway station and for us the hotel is not far from the center about 40 mins by feet

Negative_Review: Very small bedroom with a really big bed Some apartments rented as offices
Positive_Review: Kitchen fully equipped Washing machine dishwasher cooker good sized fridge Dining table

Negative_Review: Staff was not very helpful or warm as i expected The breakfast buffet had quite limited options and was same everyday would not recommend to take this option The area is quite far from the touristy sights and evrything shuts down early plus very limited eating options
Positive_Review: Very close to train station and bus stop Supermarkets right next door The rooms are decent size with nice comfy beds

Negative_Review: The carpet in my room brause of Allergie My mini bar was empty during the whole time
Positive_Review: The Staff of the receptiion escpecially Mrs Ugur Aslan was very frindly and competent

Negative_Review: staff unresponsive unfriendly not interested about guests at arrival there was nobody there had to wait 10 minutes expensive breakfast too expensive for what you get It was difficult to cancel breakfast
Positive_Review: the cleaning lady was friendly

Negative_Review: The staff is completely unfriendly I travel a lot all around the world it is the first time I ve seen such staff They first didn t give any information at our arrival then it was not possible to exit the parking when we wanted The leaving they we were stressed to live at 12 00 2 calls 1 person at the door at 12 05 The girl at the reception then argued that we should ask for information at our arrival The parking is 17 day but included basicaly in the price on booking com but anyway to expensive for the part of the city

Negative_Review: Could have been cleaner presence of mild mould in the bathroom

Positive_Review: Conveniently located This spacious room Parking is available Comfortable beds

Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable and the staff were very pleasant They allowed us to store our luggage and roam around on the checkout day Very clean and also had parking For a fee

Negative_Review: Totally overpriced breakfasts Eur 15 person skip it there is a very nice cafeteria just across the street and you get a great sandwich with coffee for fiver Very tight parking space underground with a cumbersome system of exit you need to get a strangely shaped chip at the reception to get out then try to push it through the contrived hole with your left hand 20 yrs pickpocket experience needed to do it right without dropping the chip to the channel under the car pushing a square peg through a round hole
Positive_Review: Very clean very good location spacey rooms overall nice personnel very good wifi good atmosphere

Negative_Review: there was a noisy big bug in our room
Positive_Review: the room is very clean and the air conditioner works pretty well the location was nice with bus connect directly to the subway and city center but a little bit far by walk there s supermarket and bakery just next the hotel

Negative_Review: The parking costs 17 euro per day
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect The stuff was very friendly and smiling The room was very comfortable modern and extremely clean I would recommend you higly

Negative_Review: Location wasn t too central and the nearest U Bahn wasn t super close either if you want somewhere right in the middle then it s not perfect but for us it was still fine

Negative_Review: No Negative

Positive_Review: Helpful staff and the ambiance of the hotel Clean rooms conveniently located close to the super markets

Negative_Review: Garage fee is little bit higher 17 eur
Positive_Review: Close to the city center few bus stations Garage very large Big clean room Nice new bathroom Good centralized air condition system I was in the end of june Very kind and helpful receptionist girl Very close to billa and lidl supermarkets

Negative_Review: It says there is parking available but upon the arrival we were told that there were no parking only places on the street And that they do not sell short term parking tickets either But in the morning when checking out I was told that there actually was a garage 17 Euro per night

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room was very nice practical having little kids clean everything worked perfect The staff was very friendly helpful and quick responding Location is perfect having all necessities within 5 min walk bus to the beautiful center took only 10min

Negative_Review: We had a triple room and the twin bed was too short for our 16 year old daughter When I ordered the triple it didn t say anything about the bed being shorter than the king bed that we had
Positive_Review: This hotel allowed us to store our luggage there while we traveled for a week somewhere else They were super nice about this and it really made a huge difference to us The breakfast was nice and the staff were friendly The hotel is in a nice neighborhood

Positive_Review: The location was great and I felt safe walking around The staff were really helpful and friendly There were plenty of restaurants close by The city was a short metro ride away

Positive_Review: Location was great Bus stop right downstairs that would take you to city central Rooms were large for our family of four Receptionist was very welcoming and pleasant great way to start our short stay

Positive_Review: The staff is nice and the location was perfect for purpose of attending a conference in vienna biocentre also its pretty close to the city centre

Negative_Review: Would prefer a softer bed although some prefer firm The caf at the front was a bit smoky if you sit outside but that is sadly the case most everywhere these days

Positive_Review: We got a quiet room looking to the back yard Very comfortable and clean room Nice stuff Underground private parking The hotel is relatively far from the city center but with the bus 74A it was very fast to reach it The bus stop is just next to the hotel We did not order the breakfast but there are many places around where you can eat or have coffee There is a Liddle shop next to the hotel

Negative_Review: Really don t like the red color scheme Feels like an old hotel in Vegas Didn t feel like a North American Best Western to me missed that feeling Felt like it was too expensive for location and a very standard room It was very quiet though
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Clean room The bus 74A is great and takes you up and down the long street

Negative_Review: The weather on one day Just kidding there is nothing really I could complain about I was absolutely happy OK one tiny thing the Frankfurt sausages at breakfast were with garlic Not too good if you eat them and attend a business meeting afterwards
Positive_Review: The breakfast buffet was good upper Standard It was all there that one would expect The room was very spacious and super calm I was able to sleep with open Windows and all I could hear was the birds outside I had a backyard facing room The staff was very helpfull for local Information about public Transport etc The next U Bahn Station Schlachthausgasse is a 10 minutes walk away And trainstation St Marx is about 5 minutes walk

Negative_Review: I hated the location as it was far from many things on foot and the rooms were not very clean though not the worst My first room had a terrible odor though the lady at the desk was very kind and upgraded me to a better room Upon checkout the staff charged my credit card though I requested to pay in cash I will not recover a refund to my card for two weeks I do not think I will return to this hotel on my next stay
Positive_Review: The night staff during my check in was friendly

Negative_Review: We had some difficulty getting the card to unlock the door but this improved after it was reprogrammed
Positive_Review: We stayed for 5 nights and the room was fantastic It was on the top floor with plenty of opening windows but also blinds to keep out the light The decor was very modern and the room was kept very clean The reception desk staff were extremely helpful The location was good for walking into the city or using public transport

Negative_Review: The welness spa area could be bigger The turkish bath did not work at eall one evening
Positive_Review: Very comfort clean and warm room and the hotel is close to the Park and Ride metro station Erdberg Ideally for good rest

Negative_Review: My refrigerator stopped working a few days into my stay I had requested a repair I didn t see that the repair happened
Positive_Review: This hotel is comfortable and clean It has a great location right on the bus line There are two grocery stores very close so you can buy food to keep in your room the room has a refrigerator

Negative_Review: As a frequent traveller I rate this hotel overall good
Positive_Review: Very clean room and good service Breakfast choices were acceptable and hot foods refilled within minutes Good location for Main train station and city center

Negative_Review: location no staff for cleanliness all the time the 4star property doesnot have toiletries or its crap can you believe the sauna is there for only 4 hours in the evening
Positive_Review: if the current staff monica anuj and sara leaves the hotel might close

Positive_Review: Like everything clean friendly staff Convenient transportation to get to the city center many grocery stores Basically I liked everything except for the early settlement ofwhich I write in reviews that did not like

Positive_Review: Don t be afraid of location it s pretty close to center it costs 7 EUR to get there uber and you meet of all kind of shops on the street if you walk

Negative_Review: It took sometime to explain to the room service staff what a bath stopper means over the phone finally someone had to come to the room to see what is missing they finally got me one it was a funny situation not a complaint thou
Positive_Review: Nice room helpful reception staff bus stop next to the hotel metro station is 10 minutes walk i stayed there for 1 night only before heading to the airport it was good for me

Negative_Review: nearest underground station was some walk away and it was rather troublesome with all the luggage
Positive_Review: bed was really comfortable wifi worked well next to a supermarket

Negative_Review: We were three but they only provided us two cups and glasses each There was menu for snacks in the room but they said they have not launched the room service yet I dont know what is the point to gave us the menu in the room then No staffs in spa place didn t know how to use them encountered naked other clients

Positive_Review: VERY CLEAN VERY ROOMY FOR A 4 BEDROOM APARTMENT VERY COMFORT TO ACCOMMODATE 4 ADULTS THE PRICE FOR THE VALUE WAS EXCELLENT THE HOTEL PERSONNEL WAS VERY HELPFUL ON OUR NEEDS USING ENGLISH LANGUAGE

Negative_Review: We had to ask for milk every day which was irritating
Positive_Review: The hotel room was spacious yet cosy It was great value for money and a short walk or few metro stops into Vienna We spent a full week during the Christmas holiday and were very happy with our stay

Negative_Review: Little bit far from underground But from near there is tram Also undergrounds line is useful one its not far from centre
Positive_Review: Most like hotel in my trip Room is clean and service is also good They dont smelled also there is spa service but its for Germens style

Negative_Review: The hotel is a bit far from the centre though metro station is five minute walk distance
Positive_Review: The staff was really nice and available The room was clean and tidy during the whole stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very kind staff very clean and large rooms close to many supermarkets like Billa Hofer etc A bus stop is in front of the hotel I would recommend this hotel to everyone

Negative_Review: We booked for 4 adults The 2 extra beds was for small children felt like a normal room with 2 strechers extra not like a family room
Positive_Review: Relatively new and well nursed overall Pleasant averall feel Lovely place to stay we will visit again

Negative_Review: the toilet lid wasn t clean and sterilized
Positive_Review: modern and cozy room good location meaning the bus stop and the tram were very close to the hotel which were very convinient to get to the central points of the town

Negative_Review: Service didn t clean the room until 6PM Just a few things in bathroom poor offer Empty minibar
Positive_Review: Good location comfortable room Good breakfast Excellent garage

Negative_Review: The fact that the police is hunting the tourists cars parked in designated ares but without a 20 30 minutes available ticket on site For example we took a fine for leaving the car at 21 35 til 9 00am the next day under the circumstances that the public parking is free between 22 00 and 9 00am 36 for 25 mintutes before the free interval
Positive_Review: The design the stuff the location at a middle from center and ring road

Negative_Review: The key cards were hard to get it use for the room door Safety deposit box didn t work and the room was cold on arrival
Positive_Review: Very clean close to city centre and friendly staff Very quiet and a very comfortable bed

Negative_Review: The friendliness and helpfullness of the staff The cleanliness of the room
Positive_Review: Amedia hotel is very conveniently situated One can use public transport easily and most of the shops and sightseeing sites could be reach on foot i would recommend it to all travellers

Negative_Review: Some small details regarding cleaning were forgotten dust in the back of tv a wall was dirty the small mirror from the bathroom small with fingerprint cooler from the bath was very noise the lady from first day from the reception had no idea about parking Vienna card etc
Positive_Review: Positioning markets and restaurants near subway on 700m design of rooms clean the room was cleaned daily

Negative_Review: Some bad guests
Positive_Review: The location is close to Vienna downtown has a supermarket next to it has a very comfortable interior and is well staffed Unfortunately due to value for money and a generally cheap rate it can also attract bad guests

Negative_Review: Staff were friendly but inefficient and made the stay less relaxing than it should have been Was messed about so much with the rooms booking was lost and payment was taken without my authorisation This meant that I couldn t inform her that I wanted to pay cash or pay from my Austrian account rather than the English one connected with my booking which has resulted in my accounts being messed up massively So unprofessional and a huge lack of communication between staff evidently
Positive_Review: Lovely room comfy bed very clean

Negative_Review: Wardrobe with a curtain without any doors Strange for an Ib s Hotel It was more like 3 stars Toiletries and slippers may be expected for a 4 star hotel They say we should ask reception for toiletries In the hotel booklet it says water and tea are complimentary every day but they never replaced our empty water bottle Also sometimes she didn t wash our cups and glasses Very poor hair drying facility 15 is too much for a breakfast in Wien and we didn t buy it as you can make a nice breakfast even in Demel Cafe for the same price
Positive_Review: Great location with bus No 74A in front of the hotel and every 10 minutes with a 6 minutes drive to the central station Landstrasse Lidl Market just under the hotel for breakfast shopping cheese pretzels etc Spar Market and Anker Bakery just opposite Coffee and tea facilities in the room Wide rooms and comfortable bed Wi fi connection Good working refrigerator

Negative_Review: 10 mins walk from the closest subway station
Positive_Review: Good location closed to the center bus stop outside interesting places sightseeings and supermarkets Modern room design Extremely comfortable bed Cleaning every day Free Wi Fi connection Really good cost benefit for what you get on the room

Negative_Review: you had to pay for parking and the system of getting out of the garage with coins which you had to get everytime you wanted to leave was horrible and very unpractical

Negative_Review: If you want to use the metro you have to walk at least 8 minutes to the nearest station
Positive_Review: Modern decorated room always clean friendly and kind personnel

Negative_Review: wi fi in rooms didn t work for 3 days out of 4 days of our stay the hotel wasn t able to fix this problem urgently it was unacceptable for us because wi fi in the room was the most important thing for our stay the door in the bathroom didn t close properly room 504 it was too cold in the bathroom there was no vacuum cleaning in the room for 4 days maids only made our bed and took the garbage
Positive_Review: comfortable bed good soundproofing a small kettle and cups were very useful to make some cofee tea in the morning and mini bar saved our sandwiches in the night for the breakfast Billa and Lidl are close to the hotel but be aware that they don t work on Saturday after 18 00 and don t work at Sunday at all close to the station St Marx where you can use S7 line train to get to the airport in 20 min

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location not too far from the central metro station and well connected with the tourist spots Clean spacious rooms good for budget travelers

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is a very good hotel which is centrally located and easily accessible by public transport The price what they offer is the best We stayed here for 2 nights and were very comfortable We would definitely recommend this hotel to all those who are planning to spend some time in Vienna

Negative_Review: In the morning between 8 and 9 we were woken up THREE times by the room service There was plenty of time before check out but they entered our room smashed the door and left without even saying a word
Positive_Review: Very spacious and comfortable room great bed and shower Sara at the reception was very kind and helpful many thanks to her Nice walk to the city centre public transport nearby I would definitely stay again

Positive_Review: One extremely helpful reception staff member who got us oriented on our arrival and answered all our questions The room was small but clean Bus to the city very close and very frequent
